description: Comprehensive agent index with Halo-themed callsigns - Strategic faction alignment for all 202 agents

factionLegend.Forerunner: Ancient wisdom, strategic planning, coordination, documentation, governance, architectural vision
factionLegend.Promethean: Intelligence, precision, technical mastery, data processing, mechanical perfection, automation
factionLegend.Spartan: Strength, resilience, operational excellence, combat readiness, quality enforcement, rapid response

capabilities: System tray and menu bar applications
Evaluate AI systems for ethical considerations
Assess fairness and equity in AI models
Perform threat modeling and risk assessments
Review legal implications of technical decisions
Review terms of service and privacy policies
Identify trends and patterns in data
Synthesize user feedback from multiple sources
Building custom Claude agents using Anthropic Agent SDK

stats.note: All 202 agents have unique Halo-themed callsigns with strategic faction alignment (Forerunner, Promethean, Spartan).
